author: CBR
description:
In this Heroes Journey clip, Sean O'Connell breaks down why Lanterns looks key to how Salvation comes together and why that matters for the bigger DCU story James Gunn is telling.

#DCU #Superman #JamesGunn #Lanterns #CBR #heroesjourney

title: Why Lanterns is VERY important to James Gunn's DCU #jamesgunn #dcu #cbr #heroesjourney
